page.title: 25Games we play at Banchory Primary School
page.content:
50-50: We play 50-50. 50-50 is a game where someone is it and everyone else has to hide. The person that is it counts to 50 and then tries to find the people that are hiding.the person that is it has to try and catch the people that have been hiding and if they are caught they are automatically it. The aim is to try and get to dell before you are caught.
Anna and Shauna
